Room.Name: Ladies Walk
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the center of the Ladies Walk in the Castle Ragnar.
Room.LongDescription: To the east the tunnel comes to an end, but a major hallway intersects there, going north and south. You see a couple of shoppes and an unmarked door on the north side of the tunnel. To the west is a wide promanade which is open to the courtyard below. A stairwell landing is in the north wall, and the stairs go both up and down from there.
